product.name: Fresh Wave Odor Removing Gel, 15 oz. & 7 oz. - Odor Absorbers for Home, Safer Odor Relief, Natural Plant-Based Odor Eliminator, Every 15 oz. lasts 30-60 Days, For Cooking, Trash & Pets
product.description:
Life is messy, and bad smells happen. Thankfully, there’s Fresh Wave. For over 30 years, we’ve been taking air care to a whole new level. We don’t mask bad odors with fragrances or harsh chemicals. We get to the root of the problem with powerful, plant-based ingredients. Our products are never made with any Phthalates, parabens, or harmful chemicals. So you can get rid of odors and get back to the good stuff, without stressful smells.
Enjoy a fresh space, 24/7. This odor-absorbing gel works around the clock, so you can focus more on what matters most. Set the gel in place to remove strong smells, and you can sit back and relax. Odor-free bliss is just a gel away.
Fresh air everywhere
Say goodbye to smells in any space for 30-60 days. Let the Gel do the work so you can kick back.
Strong odor defense
Kick out unwanted odors around your home with this natural, plant-powered formula.
Refill and chill
Top off your Gel jars to keep your space smelling its best.
Real odor elimination
When your gels are running low, the Bucket has you covered. Easy refills for constant freshness.
Our science is simple and has been proven effective with the toughest odors. Our formula attracts and contacts odor molecules, so that they can be eliminated at the source. You won’t be “masking” odors when you use Fresh Wave. You’ll be getting rid of them for good.
Through a process known as adsorption, our plant-based ingredients surround those smelly odor molecules. This creates a shield around the smell, so that our natural chemistry can work its wonders. Our products get to the root of the problem and leave your space fresher than ever.
The final step is absorption. Our natural chemistry neutralizes the odors in your home so that they no longer stink. All you’re left with is a breath of fresh air. No fake fragrance. No harsh chemicals. No overwhelming perfume. Instead, your rooms will smell as fresh and light as they did before the odors.
A natural, woodsy scent made with real lime, pine, and clove oils. The scent fades as odors are removed, leaving your space fresh and light.
The "set it and forget it" method
Twist off lid
Remove foil seal
Replace slotted lid
Place Gel in the space where odors are strong
Replace or refill every 15-30 days
Welcome freshness into your living room with Fresh Wave's 15 oz Original Gel. Combat odors in your common areas from pets, kids, and daily life. Come home to freshness, every time.
Open the door to a fresh home and get ready to relax. Fresh Wave's 15 oz Original Gel has you covered, absorbing odors in your entryways, laundry rooms, mud rooms, closets, and more.
Say goodbye to unwanted odors in shared spaces. Tuck a Gel on a bookshelf or end table for discreet, 24/7 odor relief. The Gel will absorb entryway odors from shoes, backpacks, and gym bags, or any other smells that build up in your living room. Kick back and relax while the Gel gets to work.
Gel
Trigger Spray
Litter Box Gel
Packs
Non-Aerosol Spray
Laundry Booster
Vacuum Beads
product.bullet_points:
• Fight odors 24/7 with Fresh Wave Gel. Our Gel absorbs odors in the air, leaving your rooms clean and fresh.
• A 15 oz Gel Jar usually lasts 30-60 days, depending on air flow and the strength of the odors. A 7 oz Gel typically lasts about 15-30 days. When you run low, you can refresh your jar with our easy refills.
• Our products never contain any parabens, sulfates, phthalates, perfumes, or harsh chemicals. The EPA has given our Gels a Safer Choice Certification.
• Gels contain natural, plant-based ingredients that are tough on odors and gentle on the planet. We use plant oils like lime, pine needle, clove, anise, and cedarwood to fight odors.
• Place an Original Gel on countertops or shelves in bathrooms, basements, pet areas, home gyms, or kitchens for ongoing odor relief.
• We’ve got a new look! Inside it’s still the same Fresh Wave you know and love. You may get a mix of new and old packaging as we transition.
